alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 26 at 4:21AM CDT until October 26 at 10:35PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Elm Fork Trinity River Near Carrollton affecting Dallas County. Rowlett Creek Near Sachse affecting Dallas County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rowlett Creek near Sachse. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Moderate flooding along the creek is expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 21.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 24.0 feet. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early this morning to 26.1 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
